name: ShootNRewind
description:
Short and simple shooter like old Quake with a little bit voxels and neon style. Originally made for Brakeys Game Jam 2020.2!

In this game you should kill robots on neon arena with your hand railgun. But your ammo are limited, so you should use your rewind mode on your railgun to return your bullets!

We don't have a lot of time for this event, so you can meet a small bugs and problems :) Hope you enjoy it!

Zenusoid - Art direction/Game design

Vailshnast - Code/ Effects and all other stuff 

Sound - DAN TERMINUS - Heavy Artillery
